title: How to Make Upma Tamil Nadu Style

steps.headline: Pour sooji flour into a large metal pan or wok.
Roast sooji mixture for 5-10 minutes.
steps.description: Mix consistently to prevent burning at the bottom of the pan. Make sure the sooji does not change color.

steps.headline: Turn off heat and set sooji aside.
Heat oil in a separate pan or wok under medium high heat.
Add mustard seeds and curry leaves to hot oil.
Wait till mustard seeds start to splutter and burst.
Add onion and ginger to oil once mustard seeds splutter and cook until onions become translucent.
Add carrots, French beans, and peas and sauté for 5-10 minutes.
Split 3 green chilies in half with a knife.
Add turmeric powder and salt to taste and mix well.
Add 4 cups of water to the vegetable mixture and let it come to a boil.
Add roasted sooji to boiling water SLOWLY while stirring the mixture to prevent lumps from forming.
Add chopped coriander leaves and stir mixture over a low heat making sure all the sooji is incorporated.
Turn off heat and serve hot!

text: Pour sooji flour into a large metal pan or wok.  Heat under a medium flame.  Roast sooji mixture for 5-10 minutes. Mix consistently to prevent burning at the bottom of the pan. Make sure the sooji does not change color. Turn off heat and set sooji aside.  Heat oil in a separate pan or wok under medium high heat.  Add mustard seeds and curry leaves to hot oil.  Wait till mustard seeds start to splutter and burst.  Add onion and ginger to oil once mustard seeds splutter and cook until onions become translucent.  Add carrots, French beans, and peas and sauté for 5-10 minutes.  Split 3 green chilies in half with a knife. Add to vegetables. Mix well. Add turmeric powder and salt to taste and mix well.  Add 4 cups of water to the vegetable mixture and let it come to a boil.  Add roasted sooji to boiling water SLOWLY while stirring the mixture to prevent lumps from forming.  Add chopped coriander leaves and stir mixture over a low heat making sure all the sooji is incorporated.  Cook for another 3-5 minutes.  Turn off heat and serve hot!
sentences: Pour sooji flour into a large metal pan or wok.
Heat under a medium flame.
Roast sooji mixture for 5-10 minutes.
Mix consistently to prevent burning at the bottom of the pan.
Make sure the sooji does not change color.
Turn off heat and set sooji aside.
Heat oil in a separate pan or wok under medium high heat.
Add mustard seeds and curry leaves to hot oil.
Wait till mustard seeds start to splutter and burst.
Add onion and ginger to oil once mustard seeds splutter and cook until onions become translucent.
Add carrots, French beans, and peas and sauté for 5-10 minutes.
Split 3 green chilies in half with a knife.
Add to vegetables.
Mix well.
Add turmeric powder and salt to taste and mix well.
Add 4 cups of water to the vegetable mixture and let it come to a boil.
Add roasted sooji to boiling water SLOWLY while stirring the mixture to prevent lumps from forming.
Add chopped coriander leaves and stir mixture over a low heat making sure all the sooji is incorporated.
Cook for another 3-5 minutes.
Turn off heat and serve hot!
